name: Djingareyber Mosque
description: Built in 1327, this mosque is one of Timbuktu's architectural icons.

name: Ahmed Baba Manuscript Library
description: Houses thousands of ancient manuscripts dating from the 13th to 17th centuries.

name: Sankore Mosque
description: Home to the ancient Islamic university, known for its cultural importance.

name: Timbuktu Market
description: A vibrant local market with traditional products and crafts.

name: Timbuktu Museum
description: Displays historical artifacts and documents from the region.

name: Sidi Yahya Mosque
description: A 15th-century historic mosque known for its spiritual symbolism.

name: Explorers' House
description: The place where famous European explorers stayed in the 19th century.

name: Desert Dunes
description: Spectacular natural landscapes ideal for excursions around Timbuktu.
